name: Last Breakers
overview: A vertical scrolling shoot'em up developed by the Flame Zapper Kotsujin people. First select your character each of which has their own characteristics for armament, speed and power. Then fly your combat mecha, which can also turn into a jet fighter, into battle. There is a simultaneous two player mode so you can do this with a buddy too. Points are scored by collected the items dropped by destroyed enemies and, as usual, each level ends with a boss.
